DPN1.defaultvalues: ,,,,,,,,,Thùng,,=select ton_tt from tontucthoi where ma_vt='[ma_vt]' and ma_kho ='[ma_kho]' and ma_tt1 ='[ma_tt1]' and ma_tt2 ='[ma_tt2]' and ma_tt3 ='[ma_tt3]' and ma_tt4 ='[ma_tt4]' and ma_tt5 ='[ma_tt5]' and ma_lo =@[ma_lo],,,=[gia_von_nt] *{ty_gia},,,=[sl_nhap]*[gia_von_nt],=[tien_hang_nt]*{ty_gia} ![gia_von_nt]![sl_nhap],,=[tien_hang_nt]*[ty_le_ck]/100![gia_von_nt]![sl_nhap],=[tien_ck_nt]*M[ty_gia]![gia_von_nt]![sl_nhap]![ty_le_ck],,=[tien_phi_nt]*{ty_gia},=[tien_hang_nt]+[tien_phi_nt]-[tien_ck_nt] ![sl_nhap]![gia_von_nt]![ty_le_ck],=[tien_nhap_nt] *{ty_gia} ![sl_nhap]![gia_von_nt]![tien_phi_nt]![tien_hang_nt]![tien_hang]![ty_le_ck]![tien_ck_nt]![tien_ck],,,331111,=Nhập mua - [ten_vt] ![ma_vt],,,,,
